name: test_NAF_14_4_0_verify_adding_comment_to_post
description:
Test Case: NAF-272
    As a user, I want to interact with post: 'Like' post, leave comments
    Scenario: Verify adding a comment to a post
    
    Steps:
    1. Open the app, assume the user is logged in
    2. Go to 'Community' tab
    3. Find a post with comments
    4. Click on comment button
    5. Add a new comment
    6. Verify comment is added successfully
    
    Expected Result: User should be able to add comments to posts
descriptionHtml:
Test Case: NAF-272
As a user, I want to interact with post: 'Like' post, leave comments
Scenario: Verify adding a comment to a post

Steps:
1. Open the app, assume the user is logged in
2. Go to 'Community' tab
3. Find a post with comments
4. Click on comment button
5. Add a new comment
6. Verify comment is added successfully

Expected Result: User should be able to add comments to posts
statusMessage:
AssertionError: Comment was not added successfully: Test comment QPWRlinJ
assert False
 +  where False = <bound method CommunityPage.is_comment_present of <pages.android.community_page.CommunityPage object at 0x1045eff50>>('Test comment QPWRlinJ')
 +    where <bound method CommunityPage.is_comment_present of <pages.android.community_page.CommunityPage object at 0x1045eff50>> = <pages.android.community_page.CommunityPage object at 0x1045eff50>.is_comment_present
